name: Djinni Noble
movement: 30 ft. walking speed and 90 ft. flying speed
description: A large elemental creature made of swirling clouds, the Djinni Noble embodies the mastery of wind and storm.
memorable: Its ability to control wind and weather makes it a formidable foe, capable of summoning whirlwinds and transforming into a giant form.
goals: To assert control over storms and protect its domain within the Elemental Plane of Air.
relations: Related to air elementals and other djinn.
environment: Primarily found in the Elemental Plane of Air, often residing in stormy regions.
strengths: Resistance to lightning and thunder damage, along with strong Dexterity and Charisma for evasive maneuvers and spellcasting.
weaknesses: Average Intelligence may limit its strategic casting abilities compared to other spellcasters.
attacks: Three scimitar attacks causing slashing and lightning damage, and a potent ranged lightning blast.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to create a whirlwind that can restrain foes and control the battlefield.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 17, allowing it to be highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in Acrobatics, Insight, and Perception, enabling effective movement and situational awareness in combat.
additional_information: Innate spellcasting with a spell save DC of 17.
Can cast powerful spells without the need for material components.
Transforms into a Huge creature once per day for enhanced combat capabilities.
Can planar shift to the Elemental Plane of Air once a day.
Creates a magical whirlwind that can restrain opponents.
spellcasting: Can cast several spells at will, including altering its form and creating wind barriers, along with limited daily spells such as conjuring elementals and controlling weather.
test_queries: powerful air creature with whirlwind abilities
large elemental that controls wind and storms
cloud creature that can become giant
elemental with resistance to lightning damage
